DOC.brief_summary: Double-blind , randomize , multicenter , placebo-controlled study The purpose study evaluate efficacy safety HMPL-004 patient active moderate Crohn 's Disease , compare placebo .
DOC.brief_title: Phase II Study HMPL-004 Subjects With Crohn 's Disease
DOC.criteria: Have active confirm Crohn 's Disease ( confirm radiographically , endoscopic , histologically ) , CDAI 220400 baseline screen They receive antiTNFÎ± antibody within 3 month start study medication , cyclosporine , tacrolimus , thalidomide mycophenolate mofetil within 2 month start study medication
